If not, see http://www.gnu.org/licenses. 12. エクササイズ - サイド プランク 左 ビープ それぞれのエクササイズの後、短い \"ビープ音\" を鳴らしますか? 設定 | ヘルプ | アプリについて TTS ボイスコマンドを聞きたいですか? 休止 - サイドを変えてください 設定 右から左に変更してください。 上にスワイプして始めます (5 秒の休止後) … 最初のエクササイズの前に 5 秒休止します … エクササイズ Choose the exercises you want to perform. 時間: エクササイズ 時間: Break Advanced Miscellaneous Duration per exercise Set different duration per exercise. Statistics Show some information about performed exercises, total time and average per exercise. Endless Start workout again after last exercise. Reset durations //Statistics Overall time: Count: Average: Sort entries by name by count by overall time by average name count overall time (h:m:s) average (m:s) //Intro Seven Thanks for choosing \"Seven\". It\'s open source and complete free (as in freedom). Gestures Swipe down on the image to make a break, swipe up to continue with the workout. Swipe right to reach the previous exercise and left to skip the current one. Settings There are same basic settings for the app (duration of exercises and breaks, choose exercises). You can also open a statistic overview over done exercises. Now, let\'s start … // About About … and other things Changelog, help, license, used libraries and more. Developer Used resources Contributors French translation Small fixes and whistle Japanese translation Changelog Open Github site and see what\'s new … (needs internet connection) License The app is licensed under GPL and completely open source and free (as in freedom). Gaukler Faun Open my profile on Github (needs internet connection). Intro Show the intro screen one more time. Donate If you like the app, you can donate to me via Paypal (needs internet connection). Workout images Whistle The pictures from the workout can be found on the Blog of \"C. Gilbert\". Thanks to her for the permission to use them in the app. The whistle is available under the Creative Commons 0 License. Used to build the intro screen. Used to create the \"About screen\". The source of nearly all icons.
